overview: AVN Best New Studio, Erotica X, returns with "Pure Desire Vol. 3." The movie features 4 romantic scenarios starring cute newcomer Kasey Warner, sultry Gianna Nicole, the delectable Ariana Grand, and the stunningly beautiful Allie Haze. Erotica X focuses on high quality art direction in beautiful locations, with emotional sex scenes full of chemistry and authentic desire between the performers.
title: Pure Desire 3
